courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ECE 290, ECE 310, and ECE 473.
description: Resonance and wave phenomena; acoustics of rooms and auditoriums; artificial reverberation and sound localization-spatialization; loudspeakers, enclosures, and microphones; topics in digital audio. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ECE 290, ECE 310, and ECE 473.
label: Audio Engineering
